title: CaptureViewport Command
description: Capture a viewport screenshot for visual analysis

viewport.description: Target viewport identifier: active, perspective, top, front, right, back, left, bottom, or custom name

show_grid.description: Whether to show the viewport grid

show_axes.description: Whether to show world axes indicator

show_cplane_axes.description: Whether to show construction plane axes

zoom_to_fit.description: Whether to zoom viewport to fit all objects before capture
